    • Method Detail

      • checkDirectHTTPLogin

        public void checkDirectHTTPLogin()
        Checks for username/password provided through the URL or remember-me cookie. If found, pre-populates the form and proceeds with login.

      • getTarget

        public com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Destination getTarget()

      • clearLoginCookies

      • getSpecialLoginExceptionMessage

        protected java.lang.String getSpecialLoginExceptionMessage(javax.security.auth.login.LoginException exception)
        This should be overridden to return messages for any subclasses of LoginException not handled in getLoginExceptionMessage() before returning the default message by calling the super method.
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception thrown by the LoginManager.
        Returns:
        The appropriate String message for this subclass of LoginException.
